backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining order, user, and design data types, authorization helpers, state maps, and basic query methods such as healthCheck and user profile access.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module exposing OldActor and NewActor structures and a run function that forwards old state unchanged to the new canister version.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a hallmark‑update feature to affected frontend file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React application and loads main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest declaring app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch, and activate handlers with cache strategies for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React router and bootstrap logic handling authentication, profile loading, admin checks, and routing to dashboards.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permissions, offering messaging and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Displays a full-page error screen when profile loading fails, showing a retry option, logout, and technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication and clears query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Shows a screen for authenticated users without a profile, including principal ID copy support and admin instructions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Provides an admin‑only modal for initial profile setup, allowing the first user to enter a name and trigger profile creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards children by required roles, showing loading or access‑denied states based on effective user role.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: A React error boundary that shows a fallback UI with error details and options to reload or clear session.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing technical error details with a copy‑to‑clipboard action.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert component with optional retry and technical details panel.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown menu for exporting orders in various formats, including CSV and per‑karigar PDF/JPEG exports.
frontend/src/components/exports/KarigarD: Provides an export dropdown for karigar orders, allowing PDF or JPEG export for daily or total orders with status handling and toasts.
Defines the main app shell with role-based navigation, mobile/desktop menus, and header layout.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog form for adding or editing a master design mapping with validation and save mutation.
Dialog for importing master designs from a file, including parsing, previewing, and saving results with summary feedback.
Displays a table of master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Shows a scrollable preview of ingested orders, highlighting unmapped designs and indicating PDF-assigned karigar names.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: UI bar providing filters for karigar, status, dates, and CO-only flag, with controlled state and reset handling.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Displays orders in a table with optional row selection, badges, and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Shows backend reachability state with refresh, canister ID display, and error details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Displays online/offline status and pending offline sync queue with manual sync option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically runs backend health checks and classifies errors to expose online/offline status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Clipboard-copy helper hook with success/error state and status text.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller's user profile with error classification and controlled retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Derives the effective user role by combining profile role with backend admin check.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrdersCache.ts: Hydrates orders from IndexedDB, merges them with backend results, persists updates, and exposes loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating orders and related data, including IndexedDB persistence and batched uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with identity-aware initialization and timeout handling, exposing fetch state via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates and prints a formatted PDF of Karigar orders using an iframe-based print workflow.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Filters orders by type and exports them as a downloadable CSV file.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Applies master design mappings to orders, producing mapped, unmapped, and preview results with normalized design codes.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Trims a design code and collapses internal whitespace for consistent comparisons.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits an array of orders into batches of a specified size.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Computes aggregate order metrics and per‑karigar statistics from a list of orders.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Trims a karigar name and returns 'Unassigned' if empty.
frontend/src/lib/orders/generateKarigarP: Generates a deterministic PO code from a karigar name using the first three letters plus '01'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Returns a Date derived from an order’s uploadDate or createdAt nanosecond timestamp.
Checks if an order type string indicates a customer order by looking for 'co'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts orders by normalized design code, then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersKariga: Sorts orders by formatted karigar name, then normalized design code, then order number.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design mappings from an Excel workbook using flexible header matching and row extraction.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses orders from an Excel workbook with flexible column matching, validation, and detailed row‑level errors.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads SheetJS from CDN if needed and reads an Excel file into a workbook object.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Routes master‑design file parsing to Excel or PDF handlers with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Parses order files by routing to PDF or Excel parsers with unified error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Loads pdfjs from CDN and extracts structured text lines from each PDF page using grouped Y positions.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses flattened PDF text lines to extract master design rows by locating a header and splitting lines into design code, generic name, and karigar.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses orders from PDF text using either table-row or section-header format, producing timestamped PersistentOrder objects.
Parses a single PDF line in table-row format into a validated PersistentOrder with extracted generic and karigar names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for orders, master designs, queued ingestions, and sync metadata with helper CRUD functions.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that uploads queued offline orders, updates sync state, handles errors, and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard that loads orders, filters and sorts them by date and criteria, and supports bulk status updates and exports.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and manages master design mappings with search, add, edit, and import capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides UI to create user profiles and list existing users with validation and role handling.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Karigar-facing dashboard showing active orders, metrics, and bulk delivery updates with profile validation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login UI with branding and a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: One-time admin bootstrap page for submitting a token to initialize the first admin account.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Order ingestion workflow handling file parsing, master design mapping, previews, and batched uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Dashboard for staff to view, filter, and bulk-update orders, including special hallmark views and date-based filtering.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes grouped by code with search and a dialog to add master design mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker, checks for updates periodically, and logs lifecycle events.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap errors into stopped-canister or network issues and extracts canister IDs for diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Generates user-friendly error messages using bootstrap error classification and simple keyword heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it exceeds the specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, animations, plugins, and custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, known issues, and pending feature requests related to hallmark status updates and staff order fetching.
